description:
This project provides a tool to compute LCOM metrics for important Ada abstraction mechanisms (e.g.,
packages, protected objects). It analyzes data accesses and routine calls to compute an abstract
representation of an Ada package (or some other abstraction). Different LCOM metrics (1-5) are
computed from the abstract representation. The project also provides support for representing the
abstraction graphically (via graphviz). The LCOM tool requires an existing ROSE installation configured
with the GNAT 2019 compiler.
name: ROSE LCOM Tools
